about_the_game:
The Cosmetic Pack is the perfect bundle to start your adventure in Moonbreaker.  You'll receive exclusive Astra, Zax, and Extilior models, as well as additional paints to customize your Units.   

You'll receive the following items: 
  • 3x Exclusive Alternate Skins - Astra, Zax, & Extilior
  • 3x sets of 5 paints each - Captain Astra, Cinder, and Produce Pals
detailed_description:
The Cosmetic Pack is the perfect bundle to start your adventure in Moonbreaker.  You'll receive exclusive Astra, Zax, and Extilior models, as well as additional paints to customize your Units.   

You'll receive the following items: 
  • 3x Exclusive Alternate Skins - Astra, Zax, & Extilior
  • 3x sets of 5 paints each - Captain Astra, Cinder, and Produce Pals

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 Catalina or later
  • Processor: 2.6GHz Quad-Core Intel CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 13 Ventura or later
  • Processor: M1 / 3.2 GHz 6 Core Intel i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 8 core GPU / AMD Radeon Pro 5700 8GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Moonbreaker - Cosmetic Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2400 / AMD FX-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 4GB / AMD R9 370 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i9-9900k / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080ti / AMD RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Start your adventure in Moonbreaker with exclusive Astra, Zax, and Extilior models, as well as additional paint to customize your Units.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Korean, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
